# The `SymbolRef` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This is a value type class that represents a single symbol in the list of symbols in the object file. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This is a value type class that represents a single symbol in the list of symbols in the object file.

Definition at line 168 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/objectfile-h">ObjectFile.h</a>.
